channel.title: Hell Yes!
channel.description:
Well well well well... Thank you, thank you.. Thank you, thank you.. Umm...
Sorry about the witty starting phrase, I'm watching family guy :P Anyway, I think this weekend, or it might be next, On a Sunday The Nokia Nationals Round 6. Are on, at Barliegh Ranch Motocross Club (Raymond Terrace). Anyway, I'm going, but guess who else is? One of my 2 favourite riders, Chad Reed. Yes, Chad Reed. Now you're probably thinking. "Wow, look at this noob, I don't think anyone cares" or "Pfft, who cares, he's not a popular member on this community forum." Well, try and see it from my point of view. The person I've grown up Idolizing all my riding caree, is riding at my Home track. (He is Australian) He spends all his time in America racing professionally, but I reckon it's awesome he's riding on my home track, on his Full Factory Yamaha Works Bikes. These are bikes that wouldn't even have a pricelist on them, they are the best Dirtbike a full Motocross racing company can make. I get to hear one, see one, ride on the track the weekend after. Probably still got his tire marks in it.
Sorry if I wasted your time, but it is really exciting >.>

item.title: Hell Yes!
item.dc:creator: @Yz85Racer Yz85Racer
item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

Dawn:

I’ve heard of him my friends met him.

Heard of Chad or Mike? I have seen Chad Ride, but never on my hometrack.

item.title: Hell Yes!
item.dc:creator: @Yz85Racer Yz85Racer
item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

lothy:

I’m not really into motorbike racing, but it sounds cool. Have a good time when you go.

Thanks Lothy.[br][size=1]Posted on: May 11, 2007, 03:01:45 AM[/size][hr][quote=“Pookey71, post:4, topic:92524”]I think that is who he knows.[/quote]
Wow, nice, Mike Metzger lives in America and is the Number 1. Freestyle Motocross Rider.
I don’t like freestyle. But, I don’t mind Nate Adams.

item.title: Hell Yes!
item.dc:creator: @pookey71 Pookey71
item.description:
@pookey71 wrote:

It’s ok,I like to waste my time.Just kidding,that’s pretty cool.One of the Royal Roulettes come from my squadron (Albion Park Squadron) And we got to meet him not some time ago.My friend knows the first person to ever do a backflip on a moto.He’s Australian so It might of been first Australian.

Read full topic
